txt.en: You are able to dig deep when necessary, allowing your effects a longer duration or greater chance of success.

#1:[placeholder]: While utilizing the Riddermark Discipline: #1:{None|Ride By and All in the Wrist will last an additional 7 seconds.[G]|Measured Attack, Oppressive Blow, Cry Havoc, and Rider and Steed will last an additional 7 seconds. Rally the Riders will gain an additional pulse.[C]|Recuperate, Destabilizing Strike, Horn Blast and Swift Cut will last an additional 7 seconds (does not extend bleed damage).[H]|Driving Slash, Staggering Slash, and Clash of Arms will last  an additional 7 seconds.[U]|Flay Open and Spread of Arrows will last an additional 7 seconds. Seeking Arrow is 20% more likely to dismount the target.[T]|Mearas-lore will last an additional 7 seconds. Enduring Embers is granted an additional pulse.[L]|Anthem of the Riddermark and Cry of the Eorlingas will last an additional 7 seconds. Hammer of Rohan is granted an additional pulse. [I]|Fixation of Storm, Oration of the Bleak Sky, Debate the Land, and Resolution of Storms will last an additional 7 seconds [K]|Defence of the Eorlingas will last an additional 7 seconds and Halt the Charge will last an additional 7 seconds regardless of Discipline. Strike with Power is 20% more likely to dismount the target.[W]|Execute and Recuperate buffs will last an additional 7 seconds. [B]| Overextended and Camaraderie will last an additional 7 seconds.[R]|Pitch Pot, Sludge Pot, and Folca's Last Stand  will last an additional 7 seconds.[O]}
